meanings.definition: A raised or projecting sculpture or carving
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed beautiful relievos of animals on the walls.
meanings.sent2: The artist created intricate relievos of flowers on the marble.
meanings.sent3: The relievos of cartoon characters in the park made visitors smile.
meanings.sent4: The relievos of waves on the sculpture seemed to come to life.
meanings.sent5: The ancient temple was adorned with stunning relievos of gods and goddesses.

meanings.definition: A type of artwork that is raised from a flat surface
meanings.sent1: The students admired the colorful relievos in the art gallery.
meanings.sent2: The church ceiling was decorated with intricate relievos of angels.
meanings.sent3: The relievos of fruits in the kitchen looked almost edible.
meanings.sent4: The relievos of stars on the ceiling sparkled like real constellations.
meanings.sent5: The garden was adorned with relievos of animals that seemed to move.

meanings.definition: The technique of creating a raised design on a surface
meanings.sent1: The artist learned the art of making relievos during the workshop.
meanings.sent2: The ancient civilization mastered the technique of relievos on stone.
meanings.sent3: The relievos on the cake were so realistic that guests were amazed.
meanings.sent4: The technique of relievos on metal added depth to the artwork.
meanings.sent5: The sculptor's skill in creating relievos was truly impressive.
